actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and Safety.

official_title: A bill to amend section 502 of the Federal Mine Safety and Health Act of 1977 to require the Secretary of Labor to conduct a compliance assistance visit at any coal or other mine within 15 days after receiving a request for such vist from the operator of the mine.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Mine Safety and Health Act of 1977 to require the Secretary of Labor to conduct a compliance assistance visit to a coal or other mine within 15 days after receiving a request from a mine operator in order to provide assistance in the identification of hazards at the mine and advice on ways to correct them.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 502 of the Federal Mine Safety and Health Act of 1977 to require the Secretary of Labor to conduct a compliance assistance visit at any coal or other mine within 15 days after receiving a request for such vist from the operator of the mine.
